COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x150
STRING: [Phorni] “Get up... You're gonna be late.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x166
STRING: That was what I woke up to, and I found Phorni on the
verge of tears for some reason, slapping my cheek
frantically.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x17c
STRING: [Chris] “...That hurts...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1ae
STRING: [Phorni] “Ah! ...A-At last, you're awake.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1c4
STRING: [Chris] “...Hmm?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1da
STRING: My body felt heavier than usual, getting up required
some actual effort.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1f0
STRING: [Chris] “Ugh... I don't feel rested at all...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x222
STRING: [Phorni] “Unbelievable! You weren't waking up at all, do
you know how worried I was!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x242
STRING: [Chris] “...Huh? I really wasn't getting up?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x258
STRING: I looked at the clock, it was nearly ten.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x264
STRING: Considering the time I'd need to change and get ready,
I'd barely make it to school on time if I ran there.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x27a
STRING: [Chris] “Why...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x290
STRING: Didn't you wake me up, was what I wanted to say, but
didn't.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2b8
STRING: [Phorni] “Like I said, I tried everything, but you just
wouldn't wake up.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x2ce
STRING: [Chris] “That's... I'm sorry.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x300
STRING: [Phorni] “You didn't wake up once since getting home
last night. I was really worried.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x320
STRING: [Chris] “Ah... There was this practice session
yesterday...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x352
STRING: [Phorni] “Wow, that must've been some session.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x368
STRING: Phorni must've been relieved to hear that, because she
finally went back to her usual tone of voice.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x37e
STRING: Not that I had that luxury, of course.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x394
STRING: [Chris] “Sorry, I'll talk about it later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3c6
STRING: [Phorni] “S-Sure.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x3ea
STRING: Grasping the situation, Phorni didn't say anything else
and simply watched me get ready.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x400
STRING: I put on the uniform that I'd thrown onto the bed last
night, washed my face and headed out.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x416
STRING: [Chris] “See you later.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4a2
STRING: When I reached school, I stopped running and walked
instead, breathing deeply so I could regain my
composure.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4b8
STRING: Looking at the clock, I felt relieved.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x4c4
STRING: I wasn't able to get here five minutes early like Ms.
Cordell had suggested, but I'd be there before the bell
went off.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x512
STRING: [Chris] “I'm sorry I'm late.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x54c
STRING: [Cordell] “...Barely made it.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x562
STRING: I sat down and silently prepared my Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x56e
STRING: I didn't have time for small talk.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x57a
STRING: Right about the same time I finished setting up the
Fortelle, it was time for class.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x598
STRING: [Cordell] “Good. Now, about today's lesson...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ae
STRING: She paused for a while.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5c2
STRING: [Cordell] “Chris. Have you decided on a partner?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5d8
STRING: [Chris] “W-Well...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5ee
STRING: I couldn't say that I had.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x5fa
STRING: We were going to continue with the ensembles in my
room, that was certain.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x610
STRING: But that was the same as leaving things undecided.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x638
STRING: [Cordell] “I have to ask you one thing. Do you plan to
choose Liselsia as your partner?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x658
STRING: After seeing my hesitation, Ms. Cordell went straight to
the heart of the matter.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x664
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x696
STRING: [Cordell] “I'd suspected it ever since we met in front of
the Old Wing that day, but I never thought it'd come to
this.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6b6
STRING: Ms. Cordell had correctly interpreted my silence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6ca
STRING: [Cordell] “I assume you know...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6e0
STRING: [Chris] “That she's a Fortelle student?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x6fe
STRING: [Cordell] “No, not that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x714
STRING: [Chris] “Liselsia Cesarini. Mr. Cesarini's...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x732
STRING: [Cordell] “Yes, his daughter.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x748
STRING: Ms. Cordell seemed surprised to hear that fact coming
from my mouth.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x77a
STRING: [Cordell] “If you already knew that, then why?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x790
STRING: [Chris] “In principle, we're free to pick anyone, right?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7c2
STRING: [Cordell] “Even so. Do you understand the implications
of your choice?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x7d8
STRING: [Chris] “...I do.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x80a
STRING: [Cordell] “＊sigh＊”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x820
STRING: She paced back and forth across the classroom, deep in
thought.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x836
STRING: I had never seen her do that before.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x842
STRING: I couldn't say anything else, so I waited for her to speak.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x860
STRING: [Cordell] “This happened after Mr. Cesarini's lecture
yesterday.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x876
STRING: Ms. Cordell abruptly began her explanation.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x882
STRING: Upon seeing my anxiety, she smiled.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8aa
STRING: [Cordell] “I didn't expect you to participate in that
lecture, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8ca
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x8fc
STRING: [Cordell] “After that lecture, he came to see me with a
much appreciated word of advice.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x91c
STRING: [Chris] “...What did he say?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x94e
STRING: [Cordell] “He asked me to tell you not to do anything
unnecessary.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x96e
STRING: [Chris] “...So, are you telling me not to?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x98c
STRING: [Cordell] “Who knows? That's up to you, Chris.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9a2
STRING: [Chris] “Huh? What do you mean by that?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9d4
STRING: [Cordell] “Anyone's possible, in principle. You said so
yourself, or have you forgotten?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x9f4
STRING: [Chris] “N-No...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa12
STRING: [Cordell] “All I'm doing is conveying his words faithfully.
The rest is all up to me, your teacher-in-charge.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa3c
STRING: [Chris] “...In other words?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa5a
STRING: [Cordell] “Does Liselsia sing well?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa70
STRING: [Chris] “...Yes, I think so.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xa8e
STRING: [Cordell] “Can you bring yourself to ask her to be your
partner?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaa4
STRING: [Chris] “...I don't know.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xad6
STRING: [Cordell] “Then I can't allow it. Not unless you're
absolutely sure that you'll ask her.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xaf6
STRING: [Chris] “If I said I would, would you allow it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb14
STRING: [Cordell] “Well, the most I could do would be to turn a
blind eye. I do have my position to consider, you know. I
can't recommend it, of course. But...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb5a
STRING: [Cordell] “I can't be responsible for things that happen
without my knowledge.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb7a
STRING: [Chris] “...Ms. Cordell.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb90
STRING: I knew what she was saying wasn't irresponsible.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xb9c
STRING: She wasn't giving up her responsibility.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xba8
STRING: She was entrusting me with it.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbb4
STRING: That much I knew.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbdc
STRING: [Cordell] “But there's one condition.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xbf2
STRING: [Chris] “What is it?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc10
STRING: [Cordell] “Give a convincing performance at the
graduation recital. Not for me, of course.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc30
STRING: [Chris] “...Understood.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc4e
STRING: [Cordell] “Are you sure? You don't seem to have given it
enough thought.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc64
STRING: [Chris] “Actually... I have.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xc82
STRING: [Cordell] “I certainly hope so. Well then, let's hear it. The
song that you've been practicing.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xca2
STRING: She didn't sound interested at all.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xcae
STRING: [Chris] “...Is it really okay?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xce0
STRING: [Cordell] “What are you talking about? I don't know
anything. I told you what I was supposed to.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd00
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd1e
STRING: [Cordell] “Then hurry up and play. Depending on how
you perform, I might not be able to turn a blind eye,
even.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd3e
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay!”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd54
STRING: Filled with determination, I placed my fingers on the
Fortelle.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xd94
STRING: Ms. Cordell sat still, her eyes closed, until the last
sounds of the Fortelle faded to silence.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdaa
STRING: Then she spoke, in a whisper.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdd4
STRING: [Cordell] “It's a good song.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdf2
STRING: She wasn't talking about my performance.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xdfe
STRING: But Ms. Cordell's response told me that she'd turn a
blind eye to what I was about to do.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe1c
STRING: [Cordell] “Is this song about a lover's thoughts?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe32
STRING: [Chris] “...No.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe48
STRING: Based on what I could remember of Lise's lyrics, it didn't
seem that way.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe5c
STRING: [Cordell] “Is that so? Then I must be mistaken. Anyway,
it's still a good song. And well played, too.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe90
STRING: I didn't want to admit it, but that was due in some part
to yesterday's lecture.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xe9c
STRING: I never thought that I'd ever hear such direct praise from
Ms. Cordell.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xeb2
STRING: In truth, I thought I played quite well too.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xebe
STRING: But if it hadn't been for yesterday's lecture, I probably
wouldn't be getting all this praise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xed6
STRING: But there was something else that bothered me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xefa
STRING: Putting my heart into the song.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf06
STRING: The result of my almost unconscious attempt to do that
had been Ms. Cordell's reaction.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf1e
STRING: In other words, had I put my heart into recreating a
lover's thoughts?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf2a
STRING: When I played that song, I couldn't help but think of
Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf40
STRING: About the joyful gestures with which she sang, or the
bashful smile she showed from time to time.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf56
STRING: I had faced the Fortelle while calling those scenes to
mind.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf6c
STRING: Did I like Lise, I wondered.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf7a
STRING: Between liking and disliking her, of course I couldn't
deny that I liked her.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xf86
STRING: But at a deeper level... Was it turning into something
like my feelings for Arietta, for a lover, I wondered.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfa8
STRING: If so, that wasn't good.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfb6
STRING: Even though in my mind I denied it, the result was the
same.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfcc
STRING: I was fine if it was nothing more than Ms. Cordell's
imagination, but what if it was the truth?

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfe2
STRING: I would be hurting Arie.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0xfee
STRING: Whether I consciously wanted to or not.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1004
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x101a
STRING: ...No, it wasn't true.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1026
STRING: Ignoring my feelings for Lise and Arie, I roused myself
from my contemplations and turned to face Ms. Cordell.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1058
STRING: [Cordell] “Are you done pondering?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x106e
STRING: [Chris] “...Yes.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x108c
STRING: [Cordell] “Then continue playing. There's still time.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10a2
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x10c6
STRING: As if in a daze, I started playing the Fortelle once more.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1142
STRING: [Cordell] “Stop there.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1158
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x116e
STRING: Ms. Cordell interrupted my performance, she looked
unimpressed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1184
STRING: I'd played through the piece several times, but I wasn't
able to keep my mind as clear as when I'd started.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x119a
STRING: Specifically, I wasn't able to keep my mind off Lise.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11c0
STRING: [Cordell] “What's happening to you?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11d6
STRING: [Chris] “...”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x11f4
STRING: [Cordell] “At this rate, you'll never convince him.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x120a
STRING: [Chris] “...Uh-huh.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1228
STRING: [Cordell] “...That's enough for today. Go home, and
think long and hard. Until then, I'll keep in mind the
candidate I picked out.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1252
STRING: [Chris] “...Huh?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1270
STRING: [Cordell] “Worried about something? As long as it's
unresolved, I'll keep that option open.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1290
STRING: [Chris] “O-Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ae
STRING: [Cordell] “Make your decision by the first day of school
next year. That's all for today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12ce
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12f2
STRING: That was Ms. Cordell's way of showing kindness.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x12fe
STRING: Feeling grateful, I packed up my Fortelle and stepped
outside.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x133c
STRING: Barely half an hour had passed since the start of the
lesson.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1348
STRING: But I didn't feel like going to the cafeteria, so I decided
to go home.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13b2
STRING: [Phorni] “Wow.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13e0
STRING: What happened, Chris?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x13ec
STRING: Phorni sounded surprised to see me back home before
noon.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1402
STRING: She hadn't laid out a towel yet by the front door, so I
had to get one myself.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1434
STRING: [Phorni] “...Did something happen?”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x144a
STRING: [Chris] “...You could say that.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1468
STRING: [Phorni] “You don't look so good.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x147e
STRING: [Chris] “...There's that too, I guess.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1494
STRING: I was still feeling the exhaustion from yesterday.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14a0
STRING: But it hadn't been that bad when I was playing the
Fortelle in front of Ms. Cordell.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14d2
STRING: [Phorni] “Then you should just lie down and rest for
today.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14e8
STRING: Phorni spoke kindly, she was worried about me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x14f4
STRING: I was grateful that she showed such unconditional
concern.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x150a
STRING: Even though there was no end to her questions about
trivial things, when it really mattered, Phorni was always
kind to me.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1520
STRING: [Chris] “...Thanks.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1552
STRING: [Phorni] “Shush now, just go to sleep.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1568
STRING: [Chris] “...Okay.”

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1582
STRING: I quickly changed my clothes and got into bed.

COMMANDS.LABEL: 0x1598
STRING: Even though there were many things I had to think
about, I started feeling sleepy right away.
